comment: Fair grader, but very slow to post graded work, provided little feedback. Assignments were easy with 2 journal assignments (2 pgs. ea), 3 graded discussion posts, and a few online training certificates. We didn't go over the book nor were we tested on its content. Easy and informative. Heavy material. Wish it was offered in a live setting.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria
